alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 6:25PM MDT until June 08 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Dawson County in northeastern Montana... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 624 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glendive, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glendive, West Glendive and Stipek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm has a history of producing half dollar size hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
